title: SWE - Full Stack Software Engineer - CoreOS
summary: The Platform Services & Operations team in Core OS is looking for a Full Stack Software Development Engineer to lead the architecture and development of essential workflow tooling at scale. The Workflow Engineering team enable teams to deliver high quality software through best in class engineering experiences, efficient workflow, data driven insights, and a culture of continuous improvement. Your focus is building a services platform that enables visualization of data across the organization in user intuitive and configurable formats.
description: You are passionate about software engineering and web development You are effective at implementing acceptance criteria requirements You are an advocate for continuous improvement culture and DevOps concepts in software engineering You have extensive experience architecting solutions for scalability and testability You are excited when leading engineering discussions and demonstrating your achievements If this is you, we'd love to hear from you!
key_qualifications:
5+ years’ of professional experience in full stack software development
In Depth knowledge of Node.js
Applicable knowledge of web libraries and frameworks like AngularJS, React, Express
Development experience designing object oriented JavaScript.
Extensive experience working with PostGres or other SQL databases.
Familiarity with web client, server optimization techniques
Extensive experience with RESTful API
education_experience: -  B.Sc. in Computer Science or equivalent experience
